caption:
This photograph captures a middle-aged man operating heavy machinery in a manufacturing or industrial setting. He is focused on his task, looking intently at the machine in front of him. The man is dressed in a light blue sleeveless shirt and white gloves, suggesting a need for both mobility and protection in his work.

The machine itself appears complex, with various metal components, hoses, and protective guards. It is processing a material, evident from the visible strip of material being fed through it. The environment is utilitarian with a hint of dim, greenish overhead lighting that casts shadows around the area, emphasizing the industrial atmosphere of the setting.

The background is mostly blurred and obscured by the machine and the worker, but what is visible suggests a typical factory interiorâ€”functional and devoid of unnecessary decorations. The focus and lighting in the image highlight the intense, precise nature of the worker's activity, underscoring the theme of industrial labor and machinery at work.
title: Employee of the B.F. Goodrich Co., working on a machine that makes molding for magnetic door seals for various bRands of refrigerators. The firm employs 184 people which makes it the third largest employer in town behind the 3M Co. (Minnesota Mining and Manufacturing) with 1,377 and Kraft Foods with 487. New Ulm is a county seat trading center of 13,000 in a farming area of south central Minnesota founded in 1854 by a German immigrant land company.
